original_text: The Israelites travelled from Rameses to Succoth. There were about 600,000 men who walked. There were also many women and children.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손이 라암셋을 떠나서 숙곳에 이르니 유아 외에 보행하는 장정이 육십만 가량이요

sentences.original_text: The Israelites travelled from Rameses to Succoth.
There were about 600,000 men who walked.
sentences.korean_translation: 걸어 다니는 남자가 약 60만 명이 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: There were also many women and children.
